MENSAJE_DEJE_EL_NOMBRE_DEL_PERSONAJE_Y_A: Provide the name of the character and the administrator related to your request.
MENSAJE_SE_PRIORIZARA_CONSULTA_A_ADMINIS: Your query will be prioritized by sending a message to the connected administrators. Please use this option responsibly.
MENSAJE_SUGERENCIA_LEIDA_Y_TOMADA_EN_CUE: Your suggestion will be read by a staff member and taken into account for future changes.
MENSAJE_EXPLIQUE_DETALLADAMENTE_EL_ERROR: Explain in detail how to reproduce the error. The programming staff will resolve it as soon as possible.
MENSAJE_DEJE_DATOS_POSIBLES_PARA_CONSULT: Provide as much information as possible. This option is for queries that don't fit into other sections.
MENSAJE_QUEJA_HACIA_MIEMBRO_DEL_STAFF: If your complaint is against a staff member, please indicate to whom it refers and the reasons, providing as many details as possible.

MENSAJE_HORA_ACTUAL: ¬1, what time do you see on the screen right now?

MENSAJE_ZONA_SEGURA: ¬1, are you standing in a safe zone?
MENSAJE_ARBOLES_O_ARENA: ¬1, tell me if there are trees or sand where you are.
MENSAJE_DIA_O_NOCHE: ¬1, is it day or night in your game?
MENSAJE_CIELO_CLARO_O_OSCURO: ¬1, is the sky clear or dark?
MENSAJE_ENTORNO_DESIERTO_O_BOSQUE: ¬1, is the map where you are a desert or a forest?
MENSAJE_HORA_SERVIDOR: ¬1, please tell me the server time.
MENSAJE_ZONA_SEGURA_PERSONAJE: ¬1, is your character in a safe zone now?
MENSAJE_LLUVIA_O_SECO: ¬1, do you see rain or is the map dry?
MENSAJE_ENTORNO_BOSQUE_O_DESIERTO: ¬1, what type of environment do you see? Forest or desert?
MENSAJE_MOMENTO_DEL_DIA: ¬1, indicate if the time of day is light or dark.
MENSAJE_NOCHE_ACTUAL: ¬1, can you tell me if it's night right now?
MENSAJE_ZONA_SEGURA_EN_PANTALLA: ¬1, answer if you see a safe zone on the screen.
MENSAJE_HORA_DEL_JUEGO: ¬1, if you're there, what time does the game show you?
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_MAGIA: Spells require a certain number of magic points to be used. Increases by casting any spell.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_ROBAR: Increases chances of obtaining items or gold when stealing. Increases by stealing. Only thieves can steal items; other classes can only steal gold.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_TACTICAS: Increases the chance to dodge attacks. The more points you have, the better your evasion. Increases during melee combat.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_ARMAS: Increases the chances of hitting the enemy with a weapon. Increases by fighting with any weapon.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_MEDITAR: Increases mana regeneration while meditating. Increases by meditating. More points mean more mana recovery.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_APUÑALAR: Increases the probability of stabbing and landing blows with short weapons. Gained by fighting in melee with daggers.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_OCULTARSE: Improves hiding chances. Increases by attempting to hide. More skill means longer hidden time.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_SUPERVIVENCIA: Allows drinking from rivers, eating from trees, and seeing hostile NPC health. Improves energy recovery. Increases by fighting or lighting campfires.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_COMERCIAR: Higher trading skill reduces item prices in stores. Increases by buying and selling items to NPCs.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_DEFENSA: Increases shield defense chances. More points mean higher chance to block hits.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_LIDERAZGO: Required to create a clan. Increases manually.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_PROYECTILES: Increases the chance to hit the enemy with a bow.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_WRESTLING: Improves unarmed combat, stunning or paralyzing the enemy.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_NAVEGACION: Required to use swimwear, boats, galleys, or galleons.
MENSAJE_SKILL_DESC_RESISTENCIA: Reduces damage taken from spells. Increases when hit by magical attacks.
MENSAJE_SOLICITUD_INGRESO: The admission request will be sent directly to the clan leader to whom you submit the petition. The leader has the authority to accept or reject requests. It is advisable to accompany your request with a brief note explaining the reasons why you want to join the clan.
MENSAJE_DIVISIBLE: The player limit must be divisible by the team size
MENSAJE_BENEFICIOS: No attacking / Clan chat / Ask for help (K) / See oneself invisible / Clan mark / See health / Max members: 25
